section.title: Frequent Questions
section.description: Quick answers to help you plan your procurement.

items.question: What products do you manufacture?
items.answer: We focus on plastic packaging manufacturing and rotogravure printing services, with biodegradable, paper bag, and non-woven options as part of our packaging portfolio.

items.question: What is your typical lead time?
items.answer: Lead times vary by volume and specifications, but we generally fulfill standard orders within 5-7 business days.

items.question: Can I order custom specifications?
items.answer: Absolutely. We support custom size, material, and rotogravure printing requirements based on your application.

items.question: Do you have quality certifications?
items.answer: Yes, we maintain rigorous internal quality control standards and source from certified suppliers.
